headline: North America Gas Chromatography Market Forecast Report 2025-2033 Featuring Agilent, Bio-Rad, Chromatotec, Merck, PerkinElmer, Phenomenex, Restek, Shimadzu, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waters
summary: The North America Gas Chromatography Market is projected to grow from US$ 1.69 billion in 2025 to US$ 2.64 billion by 2033, at a CAGR of 5.75%. This growth is fueled by stringent environmental regulations, the expansion of pharmaceutical and biotech R&D, and rising demand for analytical testing in petrochemicals and environmental sectors. headline: PacBio: The Consumables Flywheel Is Turning. The Chart Wants Confirmation
summary: Pacific Biosciences is transitioning to a recurring revenue model as consumables reach a record 55% of Q3 revenue, driving margin improvements. See why I rate it Buy.
